page.title: 13MARCONI COMPANY,CHELMSFORD
page.content:
{No other Company}has played such an important role in the development of Chelmsford's industrial reputation.
{Guglielmo Marconi}acquired factory premises in Hall Street in{1899,}to found the{first radio factory}in the world. Since that date, The Marconi Company has developed expertise and an international reputation in every field of electronics,radar and radio communications. {Today,Marconi Communication Systems}is divided into 7 divisions:- Space and Microwave;Line;Radio Systems;Mobile Radio;Broadcasting;Eddystone Radio and Antenna Systems. Across this area,The Company employs {10,000 staff}at six factory and research laboratory sites.{The Marconi {College}in Chelmsford, provides up to 700 places for training staff.
